full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 753 Filed 08/10/22 Page 97 of 264 1523
LC7VMAX3 Carolyn - direct
1 table.
2 Q. While Mr. Epstein was face down on the massage table, what did you and Virginia do?
3 A. We massaged the backs of his legs up to his buttocks.
4 Q. Then what happened?
5 A. After 45 minutes, he had turned over.
6 Q. What happened when Mr. Epstein turned over?
7 A. Virginia got on top of him.
8 Q. And what did you see Virginia and Mr. Epstein doing?
9 A. Having sex.
10 Q. Where were you while Virginia and Mr. Epstein were having sex on the massage table?
11 A. I was sitting on the couch right in front of them.
12 Q. Did Mr. Epstein touch you during this first massage?
13 A. No.
14 Q. After that ended, what happened next?
15 A. I was paid.
16 Q. Where did the money come from?
17 A. It was on top of the sink.
18 Q. In that same bathroom?
19 A. Yes.
20 Q. Who got money?
21 A. Me and Virginia.
22 Q. How much money did you get?
23 A. $300.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013110
